remarks: The size of the set of closed walks (defined as words) of length n corresponds to the size of the set of closed walks of length n (in an undirected simple graph).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 6-Jul-2018.)
statement:
clwlksizeeq $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ V e. Fin /\ N e. Prime ) -> ( # ` ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` N ) ) = ( # ` { c e. ( V ClWalks E ) | ( # ` ( 1st ` c ) ) = N } ) ) $.
$d E c $.
$d N c $.
$d V c $.
